name: Banana Bop
description: Banana Bop is an immersive, illustrated virtual reality experience that puts the player in a magical jungle. Several monkeys come to join the player and teach them how to play a series of instruments. These instruments include a rock, a drum, two shakers, a xylophone, and a drum set. After you learn each instrument, the members from a local band, Soul Human come out from the jungle as anthropomorphic monkeys and perform their funky monkey themed song, “Banana Bop”. The player can jam along with their newfound mastery of these jungle instruments.   This project premiered at RIT’s Frameless Symposium and was a finalist in MODE Fest 2021.
